fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: IHS Markit has been actively and constructively engaged in the debate about regulatory reform in financial markets and data, including topics such as the implementation of the G20 commitments for OTC derivatives and the design of a regulatory regime for benchmarks.

goals__remit:
IHS Markit is a world leader in critical information, analytics and expertise to forge solutions for the major industries and markets that drive economies worldwide.  
 
We enable our clients to improve efficiency and make better decisions through next-generation information, analytics and solutions.
